<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["inline"]}>
Set the section that this <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dieunit">DIEUnit</a> will be emitted into.

This function is used by some clients to set the section. Not all clients that emit DWARF use this section variable.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/die-h/#l00984">984</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/die-h">DIE.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Attributes

### Die {#a136362ab6dea1fc1f0d22cf4b9e81b7a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="DIE llvm::DIEUnit::Die">
The compile unit or type unit <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a>.

This variable must be an instance of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> so that we can calculate the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dieunit">DIEUnit</a> from any <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> by traversing the parent backchain and getting the Unit <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a>, and then casting itself to a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dieunit">DIEUnit</a>. This allows us to be able to find the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dieunit">DIEUnit</a> for any <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> without having to store a pointer to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dieunit">DIEUnit</a> in each <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> instance.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/die-h/#l00966">966</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/die-h">DIE.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Offset {#a912e860d1773d340c4158d50c5f80afb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint64&#95;t llvm::DIEUnit::Offset = 0</>}>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/die-h/#l00970">970</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/die-h">DIE.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Section {#a8915852581b5653ca2326d4d4cf3458d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MCSection&#42; llvm::DIEUnit::Section = nullptr</>}>
The section this unit will be emitted in.

This may or may not be set to a valid section depending on the client that is emitting DWARF.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/die-h/#l00969">969</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/die-h">DIE.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
